cause.description:
We are fortunate to realise that we owe a debt to society for all we take from it. And we realise our responsibility in paying back, in whatever way we can. Since there is so much to do, we figured it might be a good idea to focus our time and energies into a singular activity. And our chosen field is building infrastructure for imparting primary education to underprivileged children. This blog (http://ddrt157.blogspot.com) showcases some of the stuff we are involved in...
1. Each one, educate one!
cause.name: Educating poor children in Gurgaon
